name: Monopoly deal and more
description:
the classic game of monopoly deal and more!
  • Monopoly deal 1v1
  • Monopoly deal 4v4
  • Chess 1v1
  • Uno 4v4
  • Checkers 1v1

BUT WAIT theres stuff you gotta know that i am too lazy to put in the ingame tutorial
  1. dont play chess without changing the primary and secondary chess colours to something different or else you wont see the board
  2. rotate cards with a - d and mouse wheel
  3. hover over the message bubble and click on the emotes to pop
  4. right click and double right click to flip the checkers pieces
